books.title: The Perpetual Curate
books.author: Margaret Oliphant
books.summary: Incidents in a small town threaten to ruin the reputation of a young clergyman.

books.title: Pimpernel and Rosemary
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A famous journalist is drawn into the intrigues of two Eastern European nations in the aftermath of World War I.

books.title: A Yankee in the Trenches
books.author: Robert Derby Holmes
books.summary: An American describes his experiences in the British Army in the First World War.

books.title: Personal Recollections of Joan of Arc
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: A fictional biography of Joan of Arc from her early teenage years to her martyrdom.

books.title: Cornelli
books.author: Johanna Spyri
books.summary: A young girl’s emotional hurt requires time and love to heal.

books.title: Love Among the Chickens
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: Stanley Ukridge ensnares the narrator in another one of his schemes: running a chicken farm in the English countryside.

books.title: Macbeth
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: An ambitious general murders the King of Scotland and takes the throne for himself—and then he must deal with the consequences.

books.title: The Well at the World’s End
books.author: William Morris
books.summary: A king’s son embarks on an adventure to find a legendary well that grants long life.

books.title: Red Harvest
books.author: Dashiell Hammett
books.summary: A hard-boiled detective arrives at a small mining town only to find his client murdered and the inhabitants embroiled in complex webs of corruption.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Edgar Allan Poe
books.summary: A collection of Edgar Allan Poe’s short fiction, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: South!
books.author: Ernest Shackleton
books.summary: A British expedition sets off to cross Antarctica, but when their ship is wrecked they have to face a long struggle for survival.

books.title: The Jade God
books.author: Alan Sullivan
books.summary: Two years after a mysterious murder, a brother and sister move into a countryside manor and begin to notice strange occurrences.

books.title: Incidents in the Life of a Slave Girl
books.author: Linda Brent
books.summary: The autobiography of a woman who grew up in, and escaped from, slavery.

books.title: What Is Property?
books.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
books.summary: Proudhon outlines the anarchist economic theory of mutualism.

books.title: Metamorphoses
books.author: Ovid
books.summary: A collection of Greek and Roman myths that involve various forms of transformation.

books.title: Sartor Resartus
books.author: Thomas Carlyle
books.summary: The meta-fictional commentary on the life of “famous” German philosopher Diogenes Teufelsdröckh and his Philosophy of Clothes.

books.title: R.U.R.
books.author: Karel Čapek
books.summary: The development of artificial beings in huge quantities to act as workers and soldiers leads to disaster for mankind.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Andre Norton
books.summary: A collection of fantasy and science fiction short fiction by Andre Norton.

books.title: Paradise Lost
books.author: John Milton
books.summary: A dramatic imagining in blank verse of the rebellion of Satan against God, Satan’s overthrow, and the Fall of Man.

books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.
